list_definition.definition: a vegetable or vegetables preserved in vinegar, salt water etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Do you want some pickle(s) on your hamburger?
She got herself into a real pickle.

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I think I will pickle these cucumbers.
